title: Has the ACLU Demanded that Police Remove Body Cams During Inauguration Protests?
subtitle: A misconstrued comment from an ACLU representative led to rumors the organization demanded police turn off body cameras during January 2017 protests in Washington, D.C.
author: Kim LaCapria
vclaim: The American Civil Liberties Union has demanded police in Washington, D.C. disable their body cameras for the duration of inaugural protests in 2017.
